resources.string: Congratulations! Your phone is rooted.\n We will ask for the root permission next. If you choose to deny it, the app will still work, but there will be a prompt before each app is uninstalled.\nUnfortunately, this is a limitation of the Android system

Your app is not rooted. The app will still work, but there will be a prompt before each app is uninstalled. Unfortunately, this is a limitation of the Android system However, this process will still be faster than uninstalling them from the settings menu
Are you sure you want to uninstall these app(s)?
